title: YuMo The Blade Seeker
body:
YuMo, a warrior who has lost his spirit for battle long ago. His blade taken off him, once he was so powerful countless empires fall to him, and him alone. Now, he is back to take revenge on those who has stolen his treasure. With his old Skills re-invoked, Youmuu style; Shall reign again......


YuMo is a Melee champion capable of long sustained fights, with each second in combat, he becomes harder and harder to kill until eventually the enemies fall to his Youmuu Style.

HP580+74 3.78/5sec
Energy 200
AD53.1 +4.19
Atk Speed 0.631 +0.013
Armor 27+2
MR 23+4
Speed 330

Passive: Stronger With Time
Passively each second in combat increases Armor and MR by 2/3/4/5, AD by 2/3/4/5 and Lifesteal by 1/1.5/2/2.5%.
Every 3 seconds, attackspeed is increased by 5/10/15/20%. Stacks 30 times.
Lasts 10 sec out of combat.
Abilities also gain stacks.

Q: Triple Slice. 70/65/60/55/50 energy 13/12.5/12/11.5/11 sec
Dashes to the enemy within 400 range to attack them 3 times in 1.75/1.5/1.25/1/0.75  seconds.
However each hit only dealing 65/70/75/80/85% of AD.
Crit deals 15% Less Bonus Damage. 
Generates 2/2/3/3/4 stacks of Stronger with time stacks.

W: Ancient Grudge 50Energy  30/27/24/21/18sec
Hidden Passive: Enemies who buys Youmuu's Ghostblade{{item:3142}} take 1% Bonus Damage from Yumo
Using an unknown force, extending his next attack to become ranged of +300/350/400/450/500. 
As well as tapping into the Life of the opponent dealing 5/6/7/8/9%MAX HP +60/100/140/180/220+80/90/100/110/120%AD
over 4 seconds.  As well as losing 4/7/10/13/16 Armor and MR for 4 seconds every time they are attacked by YuMo while taking the damage.
Grants 1/1/2/2/3 Stacks every time they are attacked.

E: Force of the Youmuu  No Cost 20/18.5/17/15.5/14 seconds.
Passive: Gains 5/7.5/10/12.5/15% Movement Speed and 10/15/20/25/30% Attackspeed
Active: Channels for 1.5/1.25/1/0.75/0.5 seconds before enhancing his blade. Gaining triple the Bonuses and a 10/15/20/25/30% Armor penetration buff for
4/4.75/5.5/6.25/7 seconds. Increases by 1 second for every 10% HP he is missing. The passive is removed during the cooldown.
However, if Yumo loses more than 60% of his Current Health after the effect is lost, the passive will not be lost and the cooldown is reduced by 
2/3/4/5/6 seconds.


R: Path of the Chosen 80/75/70 Energy 3 seconds cooldown
Selecting an enemy within 475/550/625range and dashes to them after a short 0.3/0.25/0.2sec delay. Applying Grievous wounds for 3 seconds and stuns for 0.75/1/1.25 seconds as well as dealing 100/175/250+70%AD Physical Damage. Gains 2 Stacks of Stronger with time. If the enemy is killed, the Energy is refunded and gains an additional 5 stacks of Stronger with time.
Killing an enemy with this spell reduces the Cooldowns of all abilities by 4/6/8 seconds as well as granting MAX CDR for 5 seconds.

replies.body:
I know it's a hidden passive, but 1% damage is alot :P. Maybe +1 damage. 

As for my opinion of the kit... Steroids. Stat steroids EVERYWHERE. In my opinion, it's a really boring kit.

The Q is a cool idea. I like.

The W is cancer. I think that's enough said.

The E is just stat steroids? 

The R is a point and click gapcloser stun that makes you do damage and be able to spam abilities?

Overall, I think it's a really bland kit with little counterplay
There are some sweet ideas here. Bit of tuning needed, e.g. 8% life steal per second in combat is cancer.
